alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 02 at 12:11PM MDT until April 04 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ MONDAY TO 9 AM CDT /8 AM MDT/ TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 55 mph are expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 80 mph are possible. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Eastern Culberson County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ Monday to 9 AM CDT /8 AM MDT/ Tuesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
